str2: Neuter of hostis as conjunction; demonstrative, that; causative, because.
The eye; fig: the mind's eye. From optanomai; the eye; by implication, vision; figuratively, envy.
Lord, master, sir; the Lord. From kuros; supreme in authority, i.e. controller; by implication, Master.
On, to, against, on the basis of, at.
From dike; equitable; by implication, innocent, holy.

parse: Personal / Possessive Pronoun - Genitive Masculine 3rd Person Singular
str2: He, she, it, they, them, same. From the particle au; the reflexive pronoun self, used of the third person, and of the other persons.
(a) the ear, (b) met: the faculty of perception. Apparently a primary word; the ear.
A primary preposition; to or into, of place, time, or purpose; also in adverbial phrases.

parse: Personal / Possessive Pronoun - Genitive Masculine 3rd Person Plural
str2: He, she, it, they, them, same. From the particle au; the reflexive pronoun self, used of the third person, and of the other persons.
Supplication, prayer, entreaty. From deomai; a petition.
A primary particle; but, and, etc.
From pros and ops; the front, i.e. The countenance, aspect, appearance, surface; by implication, presence, person.
Lord, master, sir; the Lord. From kuros; supreme in authority, i.e. controller; by implication, Master.
On, to, against, on the basis of, at.

parse: Verb - Present Participle Active - Accusative Masculine Plural
str2: (a) I make, manufacture, construct, (b) I do, act, cause. Apparently a prolonged form of an obsolete primary; to make or do.
Bad, evil, in the widest sense. Apparently a primary word; worthless, i.e. depraved, or injurious.
